title: Social Education Design Utilizing Research-Practice Partnership (RPP) and Learning Study (LS) Approaches

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary understanding of educational systems and core social studies concepts
context.additional_context: Explores a research-practice collaboration model in a smartphone-based learning environment and designs project-based strategies for applying it to real educational settings.

learning_goals: The core principles of the RPP model (trust-building, teacher capacity enhancement, visible outcomes) can be explained through case analysis
Specific lesson designs for social studies can be simulated at least three times using the Learning Study (LS) approach
Team-based RPP implementation strategies applicable in resource-limited technological environments can be proposed and evaluated

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
